'''Elyse Norris''' is the wife of [[Michael Norris]].

==History==
Elyse came to the hospital with her husband, Michael, when he needed an alcohol ablation. He had the procedure, but it failed and he initially refused to try again. However, after seeing how upset Elyse was, Izzie spoke to Michael, telling him that his wife wouldn't move on. She wouldn't be okay. He agreed to have another procedure, which was successful, buying him more time to wait for a heart transplant.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
She is married to [[Michael Norris]]. When he decided not to have another procedure, she was upset that he would die.

===Familial===
She and her husband have two children.
